card.text: The Building once belonged to Judge Laban Wheaton. Judge Laban Wheaton was the founder of Wheaton Female Seminary.
The building was used for the housing of male students that were attending Wheaton College via exchange programs
the building became know as the Multicultural Center in 1986
It is now a fully staffed center
Due to her commitment to diversity here at Wheaton College, the Building was dedicated to the former president of Wheaton College, Dale Rogers Marshel.
